name: Elementus
description:
In this 2d platform, pixel art game, you control a young warrior who has the mission to bring peace to the land of Elementus. For this you have to defeat the four monsters that dominate the four islands of Elementus.

Collect the coins that remain to upgrade your sword and armor. Do not forget to collect the elements scattered around the map, in each island there are 12, collecting them you can use the magic corresponding to the island, and your battle against the boss will be easier.
